What We Build

Applied AI from idea to impact. Real automation solutions that scale your business.

Voice AI Agents

Intelligent voice systems that handle customer interactions, appointments, and support 24/7 with natural conversations.

Lead Generation Systems

Automated systems that identify, qualify, and engage potential customers at scale without manual intervention.

Content Automation

AI-powered content creation and distribution that maintains quality while scaling your production capacity.

Customer Support Bots

Intelligent chatbots that resolve customer issues instantly, reducing response time and improving satisfaction.

Internal Tools & Workflow Automation

Streamline your team's operations with custom workflows that eliminate repetitive tasks and boost productivity.

Marketing Campaign Automation

End-to-end automation for email, SMS, and social campaigns with personalization at scale.

HR & Recruitment Automation

Automate hiring workflows, candidate screening, and onboarding to accelerate your talent acquisition.

Reporting & Analytics Automation

Real-time dashboards and automated reports that keep your team informed without manual data compilation.

Generate Thumbnail Reaction Poses

AI-generated visual assets for content creators to scale production and maintain consistency.

Need something custom? We build tailored AI solutions for your unique challenges.

Studio

About LUMI AI

LUMI AI is a creative tech studio blending innovation with intelligence. Founded by Maneesh and Anjudeep, we're not just developers we're AI architects helping businesses, creators, and teams save time, scale faster, and stay ahead of the curve.

How We Work From Idea to Automation

A small, focused team that turns conversations into working automation systems.

Discovery Call

We start with a conversation to understand your challenges, goals, and opportunities for automation.

Strategy & Design

Our team crafts a tailored roadmap, mapping out workflows and selecting the right AI tools for your needs.

Build & Deliver

We develop, test, and deploy your automation system delivering working solutions that transform operations.

Who We Are

A small team solving real automation problems for businesses that need results.
